name: youtube-download_list_subtitle_languages
description: List all available subtitle languages and their formats for a video (including auto-generated captions)

name: youtube-download_download_video_subtitles
description: Download video subtitles in any available format. Supports both regular and auto-generated subtitles in various languages.

language.description: Language code (e.g., 'en', 'zh-Hant', 'ja'). Will try to get auto-generated subtitles if regular subtitles are not available.

name: youtube-download_download_video
description: Download video to the user's default Downloads folder (usually ~/Downloads).

resolution.description: Preferred video resolution. For YouTube: '480p', '720p', '1080p', 'best'. For other platforms: '480p' for low quality, '720p'/'1080p' for HD, 'best' for highest quality. Defaults to '720p'

name: youtube-download_download_audio
description: Download audio in best available quality (usually m4a/mp3 format) to the user's default Downloads folder (usually ~/Downloads).

name: youtube-download_download_transcript
description: Download and clean video subtitles to produce a plain text transcript without timestamps or formatting.
